pageContext.claim: “We've been raising interest rates and [the Chinese have] been lowering interest rates. So we're not playing on a fair field. The Fed has not been of help to us at all.”
pageContext.analysis: China has not lowered its interest rates for four years. But analysts say that the central bank may lower rates in response to the rate cut by the Federal Reserve. The Fed is an independent agency, but Trump has repeatedly pressured Fed officials to lower rates.
